Sentencas: Complex metal oxides with composition of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 (x = 0.4, 0.5, 0.6) (LSCM) have been synthesized and examined as anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions

Sentencas: LSCM compositions show excellent tolerance to both reduction and oxidation but the crystal structure transforms from hexagonal in air to orthorhombic in H-2.
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions

Sentencas: The volume change associated with this phase transformation is only about 1%, thus having little effect on other properties.
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions

Sentencas: The total electrical conductivity increases with the content of Mn, whereas the resistance to Sulfur poisoning increases with the content of Cr.
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions

Sentencas: Fuel cells using LSCM as the anode show very good performance when pure hydrogen is used as the fuel.
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions

Sentencas: However, they do not appear to be stable in fuels containing 10% of H2S. (c) 2005
Titulo: Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions
Electrical properties and sulfur tolerance of La0.75Sr0.25Cr1-xMnxO3 under anodic conditions
